00023 LaAnimal::LaAnimal() : LaSerialisable(), LaGuid()
00024 {
00025   setGuid();
00026   mName="No Name Set";
00027   mDescription="Not Set";
00028   mMeatFoodValue=3000;
00029   mUsableMeat=50;
00030   mKillWeight=100;
00031   mGrowTime=10;
00032   mDeathRate=10;
00033   mGestating=5000;
00034   mLactating=5000;
00035   mJuvenile=3500;
00036   mSexualMaturity=18;
00037   mBreedingExpectancy=5;
00038   mYoungPerBirth=1;
00039   mWeaningAge=12;
00040   mGestationTime=120;
00041   mEstrousCycle=21;
00042 }

00049 LaAnimal::LaAnimal(const LaAnimal& theAnimal)
00050 {
00051   mName=theAnimal.name();
00052   mDescription=theAnimal.description();
00053   mMeatFoodValue=theAnimal.meatFoodValue();
00054   setGuid(theAnimal.guid());
00055   mUsableMeat=theAnimal.usableMeat();
00056   mKillWeight=theAnimal.killWeight();
00057   mGrowTime=theAnimal.growTime();
00058   mDeathRate=theAnimal.deathRate();
00059   mGestating=theAnimal.gestating();
00060   mLactating=theAnimal.lactating();
00061   mJuvenile=theAnimal.juvenile();
00062   mSexualMaturity=theAnimal.sexualMaturity();
00063   mBreedingExpectancy=theAnimal.breedingExpectancy();
00064   mYoungPerBirth=theAnimal.youngPerBirth();
00065   mWeaningAge=theAnimal.weaningAge();
00066   mGestationTime=theAnimal.gestationTime();
00067   mEstrousCycle=theAnimal.estrousCycle();
00068   mImageFile=theAnimal.imageFile();
00069 }

00071 LaAnimal& LaAnimal::operator=(const LaAnimal& theAnimal)
00072 {
00073   if (this == &theAnimal) return *this;   // Gracefully handle self assignment
00074 
00075   mName=theAnimal.name();
00076   mDescription=theAnimal.description();
00077   setGuid(theAnimal.guid());
00078   mMeatFoodValue=theAnimal.meatFoodValue();
00079   mUsableMeat=theAnimal.usableMeat();
00080   mKillWeight=theAnimal.killWeight();
00081   mGrowTime=theAnimal.growTime();
00082   mDeathRate=theAnimal.deathRate();
00083   mGestating=theAnimal.gestating();
00084   mLactating=theAnimal.lactating();
00085   mJuvenile=theAnimal.juvenile();
00086   mSexualMaturity=theAnimal.sexualMaturity();
00087   mBreedingExpectancy=theAnimal.breedingExpectancy();
00088   mYoungPerBirth=theAnimal.youngPerBirth();
00089   mWeaningAge=theAnimal.weaningAge();
00090   mGestationTime=theAnimal.gestationTime();
00091   mEstrousCycle=theAnimal.estrousCycle();
00092   mImageFile=theAnimal.imageFile();
00093   return *this;
00094 }

00176 void LaAnimal::setUsableMeat(int thePercentage)
00177 {
00178   if (thePercentage > 100) {thePercentage=100;}
00179   if (thePercentage < 0) {thePercentage=100;}
00180   mUsableMeat=thePercentage;

00235 bool LaAnimal::fromXml(QString theXml)
00236 {
00237   //qDebug("Loading animal from xml");
00238   QDomDocument myDocument("mydocument");
00239   myDocument.setContent(theXml);
00240   QDomElement myTopElement = myDocument.firstChildElement("animal");
00241   if (myTopElement.isNull())
00242   {
00243     //TODO - just make this a warning
00244    //qDebug("top element could not be found!");
00245   }
00246   //qDebug("Animal::fromXml - guid found : " + myTopElement.attribute("guid").toLocal8Bit());
00247   setGuid(myTopElement.attribute("guid"));
00248   //qDebug("Animal::fromXml - guid set to : " + guid().toLocal8Bit());
00249   mName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("name").text());
00250   mDescription=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("description").text());
00251   mMeatFoodValue=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("meatFoodValue").text()).toInt();
00252   mUsableMeat=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("usableMeat").text()).toInt();
00253   mKillWeight=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("killWeight").text()).toInt();
00254   mGrowTime=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("growTime").text()).toInt();
00255   mDeathRate=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("deathRate").text()).toInt();
00256   mGestating=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("gestating").text()).toInt();
00257   mLactating=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("lactating").text()).toInt();
00258   mJuvenile=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("juvenile").text()).toInt();
00259   mSexualMaturity=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("sexualMaturity").text()).toInt();
00260   mBreedingExpectancy=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("breedingExpectancy").text()).toInt();
00261   mYoungPerBirth=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("youngPerBirth").text()).toInt();
00262   mWeaningAge=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("weaningAge").text()).toInt();
00263   mGestationTime=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("gestationTime").text()).toInt();
00264   mEstrousCycle=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("estrousCycle").text()).toInt();
00265   mImageFile=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("imageFile").text());
00266   return true;
00267 }

00269 QString LaAnimal::toXml()
00270 {
00271   QString myString;
00272   myString+=QString("<animal guid=\"" + guid() + "\">\n");
00273   myString+=QString("  <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</name>\n");
00274   myString+=QString("  <description>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "</description>\n");
00275   myString+=QString("  <meatFoodValue>" + QString::number(mMeatFoodValue) + "</meatFoodValue>\n");
00276   myString+=QString("  <usableMeat>" + QString::number(mUsableMeat) + "</usableMeat>\n");
00277   myString+=QString("  <killWeight>" + QString::number(mKillWeight) + "</killWeight>\n");
00278   myString+=QString("  <growTime>" + QString::number(mGrowTime) + "</growTime>\n");
00279   myString+=QString("  <deathRate>" + QString::number(mDeathRate) + "</deathRate>\n");
00280   myString+=QString("  <gestating>" + QString::number(mGestating) + "</gestating>\n");
00281   myString+=QString("  <lactating>" + QString::number(mLactating) + "</lactating>\n");
00282   myString+=QString("  <juvenile>" + QString::number(mJuvenile) + "</juvenile>\n");
00283   myString+=QString("  <sexualMaturity>" + QString::number(mSexualMaturity) + "</sexualMaturity>\n");
00284   myString+=QString("  <breedingExpectancy>" + QString::number(mBreedingExpectancy) + "</breedingExpectancy>\n");
00285   myString+=QString("  <youngPerBirth>" + QString::number(mYoungPerBirth) + "</youngPerBirth>\n");
00286   myString+=QString("  <weaningAge>" + QString::number(mWeaningAge) + "</weaningAge>\n");
00287   myString+=QString("  <gestationTime>" + QString::number(mGestationTime) + "</gestationTime>\n");
00288   myString+=QString("  <estrousCycle>" + QString::number(mEstrousCycle) + "</estrousCycle>\n");
00289   myString+=QString("  <imageFile>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mImageFile) + "</imageFile>\n");
00290   myString+=QString("</animal>\n");
00291   return myString;
00292 }

00294 QString LaAnimal::toText()
00295 {
00296   QString myString;
00297   myString+=QString("guid=>" + guid() + "\n");
00298   myString+=QString("name=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "\n");
00299   myString+=QString("description=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "\n");
00300   myString+=QString("meatFoodValue=>" + QString::number(mMeatFoodValue) + "\n");
00301   myString+=QString("usableMeat=>" + QString::number(mUsableMeat) + "\n");
00302   myString+=QString("killWeight=>" + QString::number(mKillWeight) + "\n");
00303   myString+=QString("growTime=>" + QString::number(mGrowTime) + "\n");
00304   myString+=QString("deathRate=>" + QString::number(mDeathRate) + "\n");
00305   myString+=QString("gestating=>" + QString::number(mGestating) + "\n");
00306   myString+=QString("lactating=>" + QString::number(mLactating) + "\n");
00307   myString+=QString("juvenile=>" + QString::number(mJuvenile) + "\n");
00308   myString+=QString("sexualMaturity=>" + QString::number(mSexualMaturity) + "\n");
00309   myString+=QString("breedingExpectancy=>" + QString::number(mBreedingExpectancy) + "\n");
00310   myString+=QString("youngPerBirth=>" + QString::number(mYoungPerBirth) + "\n");
00311   myString+=QString("weaningAge=>" + QString::number(mWeaningAge) + "\n");
00312   myString+=QString("gestationTime=>" + QString::number(mGestationTime) + "\n");
00313   myString+=QString("estrousCycle=>" + QString::number(mEstrousCycle) + "\n");
00314   return myString;
00315 }

00317 QString LaAnimal::toHtml()
00318 {
00319   QString myString;
00320   myString+="<h2>Details for " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</h2>";
00321   myString+="<table>";
00322   myString+="<tr><td><b>Description:</b></td><td>" + mDescription + "</td></tr>";
00323   myString+="<tr><td><b>Meat Food Value:</b></td><td>" + QString::number(mMeatFoodValue) + "</td></tr>";

00325 
00326   myString+="<tr><td><b>Sexual Maturity:</b></td><td>" + QString::number(mSexualMaturity) + "</td></tr>";

00342   return myString;
